title: Apple releases watchOS 8.6 beta 3 to developers
content:
A week after releasing watchOS 8.6 beta 2 to developers, Apple is now seeding the third test version of the upcoming operating system for the Apple Watch. Here’s everything new coming with watchOS 8.6 beta 3.

more…

The post Apple releases watchOS 8.6 beta 3 to developers appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: A week after releasing watchOS 8.6 beta 2 to developers, Apple is now seeding the third test version of the upcoming watchOS.
